entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garden River 12:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
